Can I create mycoin, which can be converted to with only GOLD, using the same process?

According to the text, to create mycoin, you need to specify that it can be converted to with either GOLD or VRSCTEST, not just GOLD. The correct process is to create mycoin with the option to convert to it using either GOLD or VRSCTEST.

T sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
